Dmg. Cute
Dmg. Cute
CUTE damage will deal bonus damage if the opponent is below 25% or above 75% CHARM!
Dmg. Charming
Dmg. Charming
CHARMING damage will temporarily increase your opponent's other damage multipliers!
Dmg. Clever
Dmg. Clever
CLEVER damage will temporarily decrease the TEMPO of the battle!
Dmg. Comedic
Dmg. Comedic
COMEDIC damage will restore your health. But missing will hurt!
Dmg. Colorless
Dmg. Colorless
COLORLESS damage has no special properties.

Lifetime
Contact damage
Press $0 to open 'Treasure Chest'
Gold nugget (5)
Treasure token ($0/$1)
-------------SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS-------------
DEBUG
Press $0 to pick 'DEBUG'\n'WOW!'
Endear
A standard, slow projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Endear'\n'Simple bits of affection will work on almost anyone.'
Dote
A burst of two short-range projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Dote'\n'Melt your opponent's heart with some special attention.'
Allure
A fast and pulling long-range projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Allure'\n'Give your opponent a captivating glance to draw them in for more.'
Confidence
A strong, heavy projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Confidence'\n'Be bold, and hit your opponents head-on... Don't make them chase after you.'
Dazzle
A powerful explosive projectile with massive recoil
Press $0 to pick 'Dazzle'\n'Know when to catch your opponent off-guard. Impress them!'
Candor
Three slow drilling projectiles, shot behind your back
Press $0 to pick 'Candor'\n'Be open and honest always. It's scary, but worth it...'
Geek Out
A long-lasting projectile that gains damage each time it bounces
Press $0 to pick 'Geek Out'\n'Ramble about what you love to anyone willing to listen.'
Foresight
A floaty projectile that doubles its damage over time
Press $0 to pick 'Foresight'\n'Always think ahead. Know how your opponent will react to your actions.'
Intuition
An slow projectile that jumps forward after a moment
Press $0 to pick 'Intuition'\n'Read between the lines. You know more about your opponent than you may think...'
One-Liner
A high-knockback projectile that cannot turn
Press $0 to pick 'One-Liner'\n'Practice your timing, and even the simplest of jokes can have momentous effects.'
Pickup Line
A decelerating projectile with high recoil and negative gravity
Press $0 to pick 'Pickup Line'\n'You can try being particularly direct... Sometimes subtlety won't get you far.'
Icebreaker
Three short-range drilling projectiles that converge to a point
Press $0 to pick 'Icebreaker'\n'Even simple jokes can help your opponent to let their guard down.'
Stumble
A weak projectile with no special properties
Press $0 to pick 'Stumble'\n'Mistakes can be endearing, if nothing else...'
Inside Joke
A harmless bumper that boosts the power of bumped projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Inside Joke'\n'Setup and punchline... The most fundamental rule of comedy to master.'
Tidbits
A straight-shot of three projectiles with different speeds
Press $0 to pick 'Tidbits'\n'Never disregard the little details that make you unique.'
Play It Straight
Causes COMEDIC projectiles to no longer heal or cause self-damage
Press $0 to pick 'Play It Straight'\n'The best pranksters know how powerful it can be to get serious sometimes.'
Under Pressure
Increases a projectile's velocity and CHARMING damage based on the TEMPO
Press $0 to pick 'Under Pressure'\n'Keep a level head when things get tense, and you're sure to impress...'
Cherish
Slightly increases the damaging radius of a projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Cherish'\n'Don't let anyone just sidestep your love... Open your arms even wider!'
Snapshot
A projectile may swap places with you right before you take damage
Press $0 to pick 'Snapshot'\n'Moments are fleeting, and plans might fall through... So take lots of pictures.'
Adorable Glance
Boosts the CUTE damage of a projectile by 25%
Press $0 to pick 'Adorable Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them adore you...'
Fetching Glance
Boosts the CHARMING damage of a projectile by 25%
Press $0 to pick 'Fetching Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them swoon for you...'
Witty Glance
Boosts the CLEVER damage of a projectile by 25%
Press $0 to pick 'Witty Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them admire you...'
Humorous Glance
Boosts the COMEDIC damage of a projectile by 25%
Press $0 to pick 'Humorous Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them laugh...'
Mysterious Glance
Boosts a random damage type of a projectile by 100%
Press $0 to pick 'Mysterious Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll keep them on their toes...'
Double Down
Acts as a copy of the next modifier on this wand
Press $0 to pick 'Double Down'\n'Find out what they like... then commit to it until they swoon.'
Triple Down
Acts as two copies of the next modifier on this wand
Press $0 to pick 'Triple Down'\n'Find out what they like... and don't relent even once they've swooned!'
Flaunt
Creates a blast of sparks on a projectile's first two bounces
Press $0 to pick 'Flaunt'\n'When you know that the time is right, don't hesitate to strut your stuff!'
Kindle
Converts half of a projectile's highest damage type into flame
Press $0 to pick 'Kindle'\n'Light that fire in their heart, and they might never forget your love...'
Poke
A projectile will accelerate and imitate a bounce once it gets too far away from you
Press $0 to pick 'Poke'\n'Some folks are just too shy, too indirect... but initiative is attractive.'
Bond
A field that holds and launches your other projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Bond'\n''
Hasten
Greatly boosts a projectile's speed, but decreases its lifetime
Press $0 to pick 'Hasten'\n'Sometimes, you'll need to be quick to win someone's heart...'
Patience
Greatly boosts a projectile's lifetime, but decreases its speed
Press $0 to pick 'Patience'\n'Sometimes, you'll need diligence to win someone's heart...'
-------------PERKS PERKS PERKS PERKS PERKS-------------
Clingy
You retain +4 perks that you're currently holding to the next run.
Eager
Your horizontal movement speed is +20% faster, but you accelerate slightly more slowly.
Scavenger
Treasure Chests pay out for an extra +5 seconds before closing.
Prospector
Treasure Tokens have a 20% chance to give +1 extra token on pickup.
Double Vision
You gain +1 extra copy of the next other perk you take.
Healthy
You gain +25 extra max health.
High Roller
You gain 1-3 random other perks.
Show-off
You have a +10% chance to release a blast of sparks upon taking damage.
Heated
Your projectiles gain a +20% chance to catch fire, and fire deals +10% more damage.
Committed
You gain +5 extra max health every time TEMPO increases during an encounter.
-------------AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS-------------
Golden Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The golden sheen is comfortable and familiar.\nGain 2% CHARGE each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Diamond Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The diamond shines brightly when angled towards light.\nGain 1% CHARGE multiplied by the current TEMPO each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Emerald Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The emerald color brings out fond memories.\nAvoid damage for 10 seconds to gain 30% CHARGE.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Copper Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The smell of the copper reminds you of old bloodshed...\nGain 8% CHARGE for every 5 damage you take.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Brass Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The aged brass is reminiscent of bullet casings...\nGain 5% CHARGE for every 20 damage your opponent takes.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Silver Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The sharpened silver could cut you, if you were careless.\nGraze close to 5 projectiles to gain 20% CHARGE.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Fool's Gold Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The golden surface is polished and clean, but has an odd smell...\nEvery 5 seconds, gain some CHARGE?\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Lightgem Amulet

A necklace and amulet. The luminous surface provides a powerful warmth against your chest.\nStart encounters with 500% CHARGE, but never gain any more.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Darkgem Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The pitch-black surface lets no light escape from its surface.\nStart encounters with -500% CHARGE, and gain 10% each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Amulet of Yendor
A necklace and amulet. The glassy mithril surface feels like it may last forever...\nEvery 5 seconds, gain 15% CHARGE and lose 1 health.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Amulet of Yendor
A necklace and amulet. The mithril surface feels a little less reflective than usual.\nEvery 5 seconds, gain 15% CHARGE and lose 1 health.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Memento: Parry

A small, foul-smelling ball of meat. Channels defense as offense.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate a PARRY.\nReflect nearby hostile projectiles for a brief moment as powerful homing attacks.
Memento: Focus

A chunk of soft green flesh. Possesses regenerative capabilities.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate FOCUS.\nBecome immobile until the FOCUS is complete to regenerate a portion of your max health.
Memento: Plasma

A red LED light, everlasting. Grants an attack of pure energy.\nPress [KICK] to spend up to $0% CHARGE and initiate PLASMA.\nFire a devastating plasma beam from your wand until you take damage or [KICK] again.
Memento: Dash
A delicately carved stone egg. Heightens control of one's own body.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate a DASH.\nMove swiftly for a short period of time and take reduced damage.
Memento: Slowdown

A blue iridescent scale. Causes feelings of patience and tranquility.\nPress [KICK] to spend up to $0% CHARGE and initiate SLOWDOWN.\nSlow all nearby projectiles for a time, healing upon successful grazes.
Memento: Berserk
A tuft of sheep's wool. Brings memories of gain and loss.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate BERSERK.\nFire your wands rapidly and uncontrollably, but stillness drains your health.
Memento: Linkage

A shard of the Sauvan Ydin. Amplifies connections of all kinds.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate LINKAGE.\nChain yourself to your opponent's heart, increasing their damage multipliers over time.
